label: specifiedAccountingAccount
comment: A specified accounting account for this trade related tax, levy or duty.
An accounting account specified for this line trade settlement.
An accounting account specified for this trade allowance charge.

rangeIncludes.comment: A specific trade account for recording debits and credits to general accounting, cost accounting or budget accounting.

domainIncludes.comment: The information, at a line level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.
A component of pricing, such as an allowance or charge for trade purposes.
A trade related fiscal levy or duty.
